transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Yeah
Executive: Haanji madam, yeh jabhi aapki lead ki requirement lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Madam aap kis company se baat kar rahe hain? Unicus Inverters?
Customer: Haanji haanji.
Executive: Okay.

Executive: Just a second.

Executive: Aapke yahan pe teen category hai meditation floor chair, yoga chair.
Customer: Ek hi hai bas yahi hai meditation floor chair.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Only one hai madam meri meditation floor chair.
Executive: Ek hi hai meditation meditation floor chair ek hi product hai aapka.
Customer: Haanji haanji.
Executive: Ek minute.

Executive: Madam is month mein aapne meditation floor chair ke abhi tak 14 by lead use kari hai.
Executive: Aur aapke paas agar main direct query ki bhi baat karu.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: To meditation floor chair ke aapke paas is month mein ek minute.
Executive: Direct query bhi aayi hai 12 matlab aisa nahi hai ki leads nahi hai.
Customer: Kam aayi hai bahut.
Executive: Madam lekin aisa nahi hai ki bahut kam hai agar aap pichle mahine ka comparison karenge last two months se jab se aapne matlab mahina aane mein catalog liya hai to pehle to aapke paas zero zero aa rahi thi september se aapne start kara tha september mein zero thi october mein zero thi november mein ye lead ka account aapka 12 ho gaya hai.
Executive: By lead ki bhi agar main baat karu.
Executive: By lead ki bhi agar main baat karu to aap ye dekhiye ki aapka september october mein consumption zero hi tha abhi jaakar wo bhi aapka increase hua hai.
Customer: Nahi madam 12 jyada nahi hai 12 to 12 madam but agar aap dekhenge ek hi product consider karenge to ek product ke hisab se to bahut jyada ya bahut kam market ki demand pe bhi depend karega na jis tarah se hamare paas is product ki market demand generate hogi hum us tarike se aapke paas de payenge.
Executive: Agar aapko lead direct lead badhani hai to fir aapko bhi isme investment jyada karna hoga.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Hmm. To thoda sa aap by lead pe jyada focus kariye aapke paas jo is product ki jo lead hai jo generate hoti hai wo ho
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Rahi hai hamare paas lagbhag 31 jisme se aap jo use kar paye hain is month mein wo sirf 14 kar paye hain to aap bhi apna jo by lead ka consumption hai use thoda sa increase kariye that will help you.
Customer: Kaise kare aap batao.
Executive: Madam aapko thoda active jyada rehna hoga kyuki lead aayegi.
Customer: Active rehte hain madam sham ko aadmi phone rehte hain sham ko active rehte hain.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Jaise hi lead aati hai jaise hi hum turant kar lete hain usko active isse par kya active rahe aur.
Executive: Madam aap relevant lead pe jyada active rehte hain.
Executive: Recent lead pe bhi jyada rahiye.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Abhi to abhi to koi nahi aaya abhi to aaj kal nahi aayi koi aaj nahi koi aayi abhi tak.
Executive: By lead ya by lead?
Customer: By lead.
Executive: Ek minute rukiyega.

Customer: Hamare product ki koi nahi aayi abhi tak.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye.


Executive: Kal aapke product ke liye rahi thi Moksh meditation floor small chair Pune ki thi.
Customer: Nahi aayi nahi aayi.
Executive: Ek aur aayi thi meditation floor chair ki Chhattisgarh ki thi.
Customer: Kitni aayi?
Executive: Aur kal hi aayi thi.
Customer: Kal?
Executive: To kal do lead aayi thi by lead lekin ye aapne ye ye wali jo hai dono sold out hokar gayi hai.
Customer: Haanji haanji.
Executive: Haan. To piche per day agar aapko by lead purchase karne ke ek point mil raha hai agar aap utna bhi use kar pa rahe hain to I can say ki aapke jis product aapne abhi ek basic package le rakha hai IndiaMART par uske according aisa nahi hai ki flow bahut kharab hai aapka.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thoda sa aur active hokar leads use karna start kariye baki jo yahan se ho sakta hai wo maine sari cheeze kara rakhi hai aapki isse jyada aur jyada better tarike se hum meditation floor chair mein agar aapko lagta hai sizes wagera kuch hote ho to unse product add kar lijiye kuch chips wagera hoti ho.
Customer: Ek minute jaise aapke paas koi aaye na turant hamare paas bhej diya karo madam turant hi aise.
Executive: Madam wo sari turant aapke paas aati hai aap agar us time active honge to wo aapko dikhegi agar aap us time active nahi honge to wo lead aapko aap se pehle agar char se panch log purchase kar lenge to wo lead sold out ho jayegi.
Customer: Ab mujhe pata hai madam.
Executive: To madam bhej kaise denge matlab wo to aapke paas aa hi rahi hai fir to aap ye samajhiye aisa nahi hai na ki lead aapke paas aa nahi rahi hai lead to aa hi rahi hai na.
Customer: Nahi whatsapp pe kar diya karo na turant.
Executive: Madam aisa nahi ho sakta na hame kaise pata hoga kab kis customer ke paas kaun si lead aa rahi hai account to aap hi ko khol kar dekhna padega na.
Customer: Jo handle karte hain na Vineet sir wo to bhej dete the hamare paas.
Executive: Madam wo bhej deta tha exceptionally kabhi kabhi bhej sakta hai lekin aisa nahi ho sakta ki har time hum aapka account open karke lead aapki dekhte reh payenge ye possible nahi hoga online aap hi ko rehna hoga aapke liye lead aayi humne abhi nahi dekhi account manager meri baat suno jo handle kar sake ab kisi account jaise hum aapko call karenge daily daily aapko call kar sakte hain hum ya ki number dedo kisi account manager ka.
Executive: Madam daily call karne mein koi issue nahi hai aap mujhe daily connect kar sakte hain but agar aap expect kar rahe hain ki jab bhi lead aaye aur hum aapko bhej de to dekhiye hum try kar sakte hain lekin jaruri nahi hai ki jab bhi lead aa rahi hai hum bhi usi time online aap hi ka account dekh rahe ho kyuki aap dekhiye na ki ek ek employee yahan pe 100 100 plus customers ko handle karta hai wo 100 plus customers ke account nahi dekh payega na.
Customer: Chalo madam agar phone pe kar sakte ho na.
Executive: Haan main ye dekh leti hu jo possible hoga main wo aapko share karati hu.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Theek hai? Haanji aur baki dekhiye kaam hamare yahan yahan se ho raha hai aap bhi thoda sa recent lead pe auto refresher laga lijiye.
Customer: Kya kar lijiye?
Executive: Recent lead pe google pe steps padh lijiyega google ka ek software hota hai auto refresher ka to wo aap laga lijiye aapko shayad thodi help mil jaye.
Executive: Baki jo possibility hogi wo maine kara rakhi hai already.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur lead ka generation baki market ki demand pe bhi depend karega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai?

Executive: Abhi jo ye leads thi jaise aaj koi nahi aayi.
Customer: Aaj abhi tak to madam nahi aayi hai abhi dekhiye agar main dekhu to yoga chair ki aayi hui hai yoga chair pe aap keh rahe hain ki kaam ki nahi hai mobile anti radiation chip bhi kaam ki nahi hai aapke liye.
Customer: Wo to kaam ki nahi hai na nahi.
Executive: Theek hai aur jo lead aapne purchase kari hai wahan se conversion ke samne laaye abhi tak?
Customer: Abhi achcha experience nahi mila abhi tak.
Executive: Matlab conversion mein kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Nahi to wahi hai thoda price issue issue ho hi jata hai achche se jaise abhi aapne mujhe pehle tha na ki hamari chair chair hoti hai dusri bar waise wo nahi hua.
Executive: Pehle pehle jaise abhi aapne Panipat Panipat ki aapne lead purchase kari thi char panch din pehle red meditation chair chair with back support.
Customer: Haanji haanji.
Executive: Kya hua wahan pe?
Customer: Mana kar diya unhone.
Executive: Haanji bana.
Executive: Ek aapne purchase kari thi Delhi se meditation seat chair with yoga chair back support.
Customer: Haanji haanji wo bhi ki thi wo bhi mana kar diya tha unhone jo abhi aap bata rahe ho maine sab ki hui hai.
Executive: To haan ye aap hi ki puch rahi thi main to aur secondly madam aap jo bhi lead purchase karti hai ya call aati hai us pe aapko ek cheez pe focus karna hai ki aapko IndiaMART ki hi lead manager se teen reply bhi karne hai aur call back bhi aap agar try kariye ki aap IndiaMART ke system se hi kar paye.
Executive: Wo aapko help karega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai aur thoda sa apne rating aapko 16 logon ne de rakhi hai but try kariye ki aap apne reviews aur increase kar paye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai baki aapke paas mera number hai aap mujhe is number pe connect kar sakte hain jis number pe abhi aap baat kar rahe hain number note kar lijiye aap mera haan.
Customer: Number hai mere paas aapka.
Executive: Mera number nahi hoga aapke paas.
Customer: Ye abhi aapne customer care se call kara bol bol.
Executive: Haan haan mera number 80699 80699 125 125 92 92 zero jarur lagayega sorry Risha Risha yes mam aur zero jarur lagayega call se pehle otherwise call connect nahi hoga mam.
Customer: 80699125292 ha lekin eight se pehle zero laga lijiyega wo laga liya maine laga liya theek hai theek hai aur baki main abhi aapka ye jo aapne customer care pe call kara tha ye concern main close kar rahi hu.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says leads are not being received.

- Customer wants leads on WhatsApp.



Resolution:

- Executive explained lead generation depends on market demand.

- Executive suggested using auto-refreshers for recent leads.

- Executive shared tips to increase lead conversion.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check for possible solutions.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, lead generation, whatsapp
